gw.solr.mapper

Class BuildPhones

implements ISolrIndexMapper, ISolrQueryMapper<T>, ISolrQueryResultMapper, _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.json.simple.JSONArray mapIndex(List<DataProperty> inputDataProperties, IDataHolder dataHolder)
      Phone numbers are normalized by Solr index pipeline. bbb (See gw_phone definition in schema.xml)
      String mapQuery(List<DataProperty> queryDataProperties, IDataHolder dataHolder)
      Maps entered phone number to query term. Value is encoded according to this field's encoder and also normalized by Solr query pipeline (See gw_phone definition in schema.xml)
      Object mapQueryResult(List<ResultField> resultFields, List<DataProperty> criteriaProperties, IDataHolder dataHolder, IResultHolder solrResult)
      Map the proper phone number from Solr response to a result field. Specifically, if a phone number was used as a search criterion and produced a match, then map this value. Otherwise, map the first phone number, if any, in the result set into the result field. This version handles US locales only
      String mapSortColumn(List<ResultField> resultFields, List<DataProperty> criteriaProperties, IDataHolder dataHolder)
      Phones column is not sortable

    • Method Detail

      • mapIndex

        org.json.simple.JSONArray mapIndex(List<DataProperty> inputDataProperties,
                                 IDataHolder dataHolder)
        Phone numbers are normalized by Solr index pipeline. bbb (See gw_phone definition in schema.xml)
        Parameters:
        inputDataProperties - array of entity properties
        dataHolder -
        Returns:
        JSONArray of phone number strings or null if no phone numbers

      • mapQuery

        String mapQuery(List<DataProperty> queryDataProperties,
              IDataHolder dataHolder)
        Maps entered phone number to query term. Value is encoded according to this field's encoder and also normalized by Solr query pipeline (See gw_phone definition in schema.xml)
        Parameters:
        queryDataProperties -
        dataHolder -
        Returns:
        raw phone number string entered by user or null

      • mapSortColumn

        String mapSortColumn(List<ResultField> resultFields,
                   List<DataProperty> criteriaProperties,
                   IDataHolder dataHolder)
        Phones column is not sortable
        Parameters:
        resultFields -
        criteriaProperties -
        dataHolder -
        Returns:
        Name of solr field for sorting these results by or null if sorting this field is not supported

      • mapQueryResult

        Object mapQueryResult(List<ResultField> resultFields,
                    List<DataProperty> criteriaProperties,
                    IDataHolder dataHolder,
                    IResultHolder solrResult)
        Map the proper phone number from Solr response to a result field. Specifically, if a phone number was used as a search criterion and produced a match, then map this value. Otherwise, map the first phone number, if any, in the result set into the result field. This version handles US locales only
        Parameters:
        resultFields -
        criteriaProperties -
        dataHolder -
        solrResult -
        Returns:
        single phone number or empty string
